artist: Painter: After Jacobus Buys; Printer: Reiner Vinkeles; Engraver: Cornelis Bogaerts
description: two images mounted on a single mat: a.) bust length portrait in a circle; man facing slight left and looking left; wearing a jacket with lace edging at center front; plaque below portrait with cannon, barrel, rod and cannon balls b.) rectangular frame with portrait bust of a man facing right and lookingtoward viewer; wearing jacket with white shirt, cravat tied with a bow; a pedestal below image with sitter's name on plaque
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

a.) above image in black: XVII.D.Pl.X | around circle in image: DE GENERAAL VAN RUSSEL | below image: J.Buys   Reiner Vinkles & C. Bogerts sculp

b.) on plaque in image: W.G.F. GRAVE VAN BENTINCK | below image in black: Reiners Vinkels sculp 1798 | below image in pencil: 2-561
title: a) De Generaal Van Russel; b.) W.G.F. Grave van Bentinck
